load("@rules_rust//cargo:defs.bzl", "cargo_build_script")
load("@rules_rust//rust:defs.bzl", "rust_doc", "rust_library", "rust_test")

rust_library(
    name = "foo-bar",
    srcs = glob(["**/*.rs"]),
    compile_data = glob(["**"]),
    crate_features = [
        "bar",
        "baz",
        "default",
    ],
    crate_name = "foo_bar",
    edition = "2018",
    proc_macro_deps = [
        "//vendor/rust/proc-macro2",
    ],
    rustc_flags = [
        # In most cases, warnings in 3rd party crates are not interesting as
        # they're out of the control of consumers. The flag here silences
        # warnings. For more details see:
        # https://doc.rust-lang.org/rustc/lints/levels.html
        "--cap-lints=allow",
    ],
    tags = [
        "manual",  # Only build when needed as a dependency.
    ],
    version = "1.2.3",
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
    deps = [
        ":foo-bar_build_script",
        "//vendor/rust/apic-two",
        "//vendor/rust/serde",
    ],
)

cargo_build_script(
    name = "foo-bar_build_script",  # This is special-cased in Rustc, so don't change it.
    srcs = glob(["**/*.rs"]),
    crate_name = "build_script_build",
    crate_root = "build.rs",
    edition = "2018",
    rustc_flags = [
        # In most cases, warnings in 3rd party crates are not interesting as
        # they're out of the control of consumers. The flag here silences
        # warnings. For more details see:
        # https://doc.rust-lang.org/rustc/lints/levels.html
        "--cap-lints=allow",
    ],
    version = "1.2.3",
    visibility = ["//visibility:private"],
    deps = [
        "//vendor/rust/apic",
        "//vendor/rust/serde",
    ],
)

rust_doc(
    name = "docs",
    crate = ":foo-bar",
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
)

rust_test(
    name = "foo-bar_test",
    size = "small",
    compile_data = glob(["**"]),
    crate = ":foo-bar",
    crate_name = "foo_bar",
    data = [
        "@rust_linux_x86_64//:rustc",
    ],
    env = {
        "RUSTC": "$(location @rust_linux_x86_64//:rustc)",
    },
    rustc_flags = [
        # In most cases, warnings in 3rd party crates are not interesting as
        # they're out of the control of consumers. The flag here silences
        # warnings. For more details see:
        # https://doc.rust-lang.org/rustc/lints/levels.html
        "--cap-lints=allow",
    ],
    deps = [
        "//vendor/rust/serde",
    ],
)
